justification: Acknowledges Team B’s schedule focus and comfort with injured players, but misreads that B would trade a Tier 2 rookie (Martinez) they likely value highly for an injured Tier 3 WR (Garcia). Misstates playoff schedules (Ben King tough; Martinez mixed), yet claims A receives friendly schedules. Team A’s preferences (possession WRs, workhorse RBs, low variance) don’t align well with Martinez’s high variance or King’s committee role. Value is lopsided toward A; 0.62 accept probability is unrealistic. Reasoning is present but applied inaccurately.
